creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: self-edged; blue lined; sash-shaped purse with zipper and two end ties; eleven scroll medallions in magenta and blue with gold metal buttons in center of each; 1/4" blue scroll border at bottom, and small floral embroidery on top and side edges
dimension:
63 3/4 x 3 1/2 in. (161.93 x 8.89 cm) (including ties)
18 1/2 in. (46.99 cm) (object part, two ties, each)
title: Purse (or Sash?)
